mapper.insert: insert into order_detail (order_id, md_id , order_detail_qty, order_detail_price, order_detail_amt , order_detail_discount, order_detail_discount_amt , order_detail_pay_amt) select #{order_id}, md.md_id , #{buy_now_qty}, md.md_price, #{buy_now_qty} * md.md_price , md.md_discount, #{buy_now_qty} * md.md_price / 100 * md.md_discount , (#{buy_now_qty} * md.md_price) - (#{buy_now_qty} * md.md_price / 100 * md.md_discount) from md md where md.md_id = #{buy_now_md_id}
mapper.select: select 0 cart_id, #{buy_qty} as buy_qty, now() , md.md_id, md.md_name, m.member_nick, md.md_stock, md.md_price, md.md_discount , md.md_price - (md.md_price / 100 * md.md_discount) as sale_price , ( md.md_price - (md.md_price / 100 * md.md_discount) ) * #{buy_qty} as total_price , md.md_content, md.reg_date , md.md_thumbnail_name, md.md_thumbnail_path, md.md_detail_name, md.md_detail_path from md md, member m where md.md_id = #{md_id}

select c.cart_id, c.member_id, m.member_nick, c.md_id, c.buy_qty, c.reg_date , md.md_id, md.md_name, md.md_stock, md.md_price, md.md_discount , md.md_price - (md.md_price / 100 * md.md_discount) sale_price , ( md.md_price - (md.md_price / 100 * md.md_discount) ) * c.buy_qty total_price , md.md_content, md.reg_date , md.md_thumbnail_name, md.md_thumbnail_path, md.md_detail_name, md.md_detail_path
from cart c, member m, md md where c.cart_id in
#{cart_id}
and c.member_id = m.member_id and c.md_id = md.md_id order by c.reg_date desc
